name: Domiverse
description:
Play as a karate master starfish, a space slug, or a prince sausage firin’ some... BIG LAZEEEERS! Choose one of the 8+ heroes, each with unique skills and try to win the Domiverse Tournament ™. You will dive into a wacky world where each hit kills. Take on your friends in a furious battle to become the King of the universe.

Awesome features
  • One hit one kill
  • Unique skills for each characters
  • 1-4 players
  • 8 playable characters + 2 to unlock
  • Trapped arenas
  • Easy to learn, hard to master!
You got friends
  • Free for all / Team
  • Survival
  • Ace hunter
  • King of the hill
Forever alone
  • Arcade
  • Trials
  • Ai opponents
Webcomics
